duties_responsibilities.duty: Adjudicate prior authorization requests and claims based on dental standards and best practices.
Collaborate with internal and external parties to gather information for claim or prior authorization determination.
Respond to inquiries regarding claim or prior authorization requests.
Report potential Fraud, Waste, and Abuse (FWA) issues and process requests for re-evaluation.
Review and analyze patient quality-of-care complaints and maintain logs of resolved grievances.
Conduct or assist in developing seminars or training programs as needed.

education_certification.credential: DDS or DMS degree from an accredited dental school.
Active and unencumbered license with the Dental Licensing Board.
Special training and/or professional certificates may be substituted for experience.
